unnormalised: ## EV Charging News: Juice Up Your Ride, Paisa Vasool!
normalised: ## E V Charging News: Juice Up Your Ride, Rupee Vasool!

unnormalised: Hey petrolheads, time to switch gears! The EV revolution is picking up speed, and guess what? Charging infrastructure is finally getting some love. IIT-Bombay is working on some seriously cool fast-charging tech that promises to juice up your Tata Nexon in a jiffy.
normalised: Hey petrolheads, time to switch gears! The E V revolution is picking up speed, and guess what? Charging infrastructure is finally getting some love. I I T-Bombay is working on some seriously cool fast-charging tech that promises to juice up your Tata Nexon in a jiffy.

unnormalised: Remember that scene in 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge' where Raj misses the train? Well, imagine missing your highway charging slot because it's occupied! That's the kind of anxiety nobody needs.
normalised: Remember that scene in 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge' where Raj misses the train? Well, imagine missing your highway charging slot because it's occupied! That's the kind of anxiety nobody needs.

unnormalised: But don't worry, companies like Ather Energy are expanding their charging grids, popping up in unexpected places like chai stalls and dhabas. Talk about convenience, eh?
normalised: But don't worry, companies like Ather Energy are expanding their charging grids, popping up in unexpected places like chai stalls and dhabas. Talk about convenience, eh?

unnormalised: Plus, the government's FAME-II scheme is giving a much-needed boost, subsidizing the installation of charging stations across the country.
normalised: Plus, the government's F A M E-I I scheme is giving a much-needed boost, subsidizing the installation of charging stations across the country.

unnormalised: We're talking charging points every few km on major highways, so you can road trip from Mumbai to Goa without range anxiety cramping your style. Think of all the money you'll save on petrol, *Rs.* definitely *vasool*! This Diwali, maybe gift yourself an electric ride? Just a thought!
normalised: We're talking charging points every few kilometer on major highways, so you can road trip from Mumbai to Goa without range anxiety cramping your style. Think of all the money you'll save on petrol, rupee definitely vasool! This Diwali, maybe gift yourself an electric ride? Just a thought!

unnormalised: Keep an eye out for more updates! And remember, drive safe!
normalised: Keep an eye out for more updates! And remember, drive safe!
